nodes.documentation:
@notice Recalculate and update SIGH speeds for all Supported SIGH markets
1. Instrument indexes for all instruments updated
2. Delta blocks (past 24 hours) calculated and current block number (for price snapshot) updated
3. 1st loop over all instruments --> Average loss (per block) for each of the supported instruments
   along with the total lending protocol's loss (per block) calculated and stored price snapshot is updated
4. The Sigh speed that will be used for speed refersh calculated (provided if is needed to be done) 
5. 1st loop over all instruments -->  Sigh Distribution speed (Loss driven speed + staking speed) calculated for 
   each instrument
5.1 Current Clock updated
nodes.name: refreshSIGHSpeedsInternal

nodes.name: transferSighTotheUser

Instrument_SIGH_StateUpdated(address,uin.details: Instrument to be convered under the SIGH DIstribution Mechanism and the associated Volatility Limits - Decided by the SIGH Finance Manager who  can call this function through the Sigh Finance Configurator

addInstrument(address,address,address,ui.details: adds an instrument - Called by LendingPool Core when an instrument is added to the Lending Protocol

params._decimals: the number of decimals of the underlying asset*
params._iTokenAddress: the address of the overlying iToken contract

removeInstrument(address).details: removes an instrument - Called by LendingPool Core when an instrument is removed from the Lending Protocol

transferSighTotheUser(address,address,ui.details: Note: If there is not enough SIGH, we do not perform the transfer call.

params.instrument: The instrument for which the SIGH has been accured
params.sigh_Amount: The amount of SIGH to (possibly) transfer
params.user: The address of the user to transfer SIGH to

transferSighTotheUser(address,address,ui.return: The amount of SIGH which was NOT transferred to the user

params.currentInstrument: The market whose borrow index to update

params.SIGHSpeed_: The amount of SIGH wei per block to distribute

params.currentInstrument: The Instrument whose supply index to update

params.newStakingSpeed: The additional SIGH staking speed assigned to the Instrument

refreshSIGHSpeeds().notice: Recalculate and update SIGH speeds for all Supported SIGH markets

transferSighTotheUser(address,address,ui.notice: Transfer SIGH to the user. Called by the corresponding IToken Contract of the instrument

updateDeltaBlocksForSpeedRefresh(uint256.notice: Updates the minimum blocks to be mined before speed can be refreshed again  - Decided by the SIGH Finance Manager who  can call this function through the Sigh Finance Configurator

updateSIGHBorrowIndex(address).notice: Accrue SIGH to the market by updating the borrow index

updateSIGHSpeed(uint256).notice: Sets the amount of Global SIGH distributed per block - - Decided by the SIGH Finance Manager who  can call this function through the Sigh Finance Configurator

updateSIGHSupplyIndex(address).notice: Accrue SIGH to the Instrument by updating the supply index

updateStakingSpeedForAnInstrument(addres.notice: Sets the staking speed for an Instrument - Decided by the SIGH Finance Manager who  can call this function through the Sigh Finance Configurator
